name: Boss Tactics
description:
Controls

[Z] - Select / Confirm
[X] - Cancel / Menu
[Arrow Keys] - Move around
[Left Mouse Click] - Select / Confirm
[Right Mouse Click] - Cancel / Menu
[1 Finger Tap] - Select / Confirm
[2 Finger Tap] - Cancel / Menu


An SRPG / tactical RPG involving the Obsidian Dragon and 4 heroes of varying classes. Each hero has an array of different skills with varying ways to achieve victory.  Defeat the Obsidian Dragon and post your best time on the leaderboards!
